item.description: My raw notes for The Untamed, started when I was trying to make sense of the plot but now an indispensable resource for fic. Lots of shorthand and emoji feels so probably useless to anybody but me ğŸ¤·ğŸ»â€â™€ï¸ Ep 1 WWX resurrecting in Jin color robes, lolllâ€”cannot fully appreciate the irony of this the first time around Lan clan using the lure flags he made; already innovating ğŸ˜­ SZ recognizing Wuji from LWJ playing it in Gusu ğŸ˜­ (==diegetic Wuji==, â€œfluteâ€/grass) (ALSO, he would be not realizing he recognizes it from WWX playing it in Burial Mounds) Full moon Btw a-Yuan (æ„¿) means â€œwishesâ€ and Sizhui (æ€è¿½) means â€œmiss you and chase you,â€ so basically SZ is a love letter to WWX from LWJ ğŸ˜­ Ep 2 Is WWX your dad?
